title: EntityCacheDataService
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityCacheDataServicelink

Default data service for making remote service calls targeting the entire EntityCache. See EntityDataService for services that target a single EntityCollection

class EntityCacheDataService { protected idSelectors: {...} protected saveDelay: 0 protected timeout: 0 protected entityDefinitionService: EntityDefinitionService protected http: HttpClient saveEntities(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>, url: string): Observable<ChangeSet> protected handleError(reqData: RequestData) protected filterChangeSet(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet protected flattenUpdates(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet protected restoreUpdates(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet protected getIdSelector(entityName: string) }

Property Description
protected idSelectors: { [entityName: string]: IdSelector<any>; }
protected saveDelay: 0
protected timeout: 0
protected entityDefinitionService: EntityDefinitionService
protected http: HttpClient

Methodslink

saveEntities() link

mode_edit code

Save changes to multiple entities across one or more entity collections. Server endpoint must understand the essential SaveEntities protocol, in particular the ChangeSet interface (except for Update). This implementation extracts the entity changes from a ChangeSet Update[] and sends those. It then reconstructs Update[] in the returned observable result.
saveEntities(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>, url: string): Observable<ChangeSet>

Parameters

changeSet ChangeSet<any>

An array of SaveEntityItems. Each SaveEntityItem describe a change operation for one or more entities of a single collection, known by its 'entityName'.
url string

The server endpoint that receives this request.

Returns

Observable<ChangeSet>

filterChangeSet() link

mode_edit code

Filter changeSet to remove unwanted ChangeSetItems. This implementation excludes null and empty ChangeSetItems.
protected filterChangeSet(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet

Parameters

changeSet ChangeSet<any>

ChangeSet with changes to filter

Returns

ChangeSet

flattenUpdates() link

mode_edit code

Convert the entities in update changes from @ngrx Update structure to just T. Reverse of restoreUpdates().
protected flattenUpdates(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet

Parameters

changeSet ChangeSet<any>

Returns

ChangeSet

restoreUpdates() link

mode_edit code

Convert the flattened T entities in update changes back to @ngrx Update structures. Reverse of flattenUpdates().
protected restoreUpdates(changeSet: ChangeSet<any>): ChangeSet

Parameters

changeSet ChangeSet<any>

Returns

ChangeSet
